name: Activity 1
description: Create a simple webpage that displays the text 'Hello World' centered both vertically and horizontally within the browser window using HTML and CSS.

name: Activity 2
description: Develop a counter application with increment and decrement buttons, an indication of whether the count is odd or even, and a reset button to return the counter to zero.

name: Activity 3
description: Build a basic calculator that allows users to add two numbers through input fields, displaying the sum in real-time without needing an equals button, along with a reset option to clear inputs.

name: Activity 4
description: Create a centered button labeled 'GROW' that doubles in size and changes to a random color each time it is clicked, enhancing interactivity and visual appeal.

name: Activity 5
description: Implement a basic to-do list application that allows users to add, remove, and toggle the completion status of tasks, providing a straightforward task management experience.

name: Activity 6: Pokemon API
description: Fetch and display data from a chosen API as cards, each featuring an avatar, a name, and a description. Use CSS Flexbox for a responsive design that adapts to various screen sizes.

name: Activity 7
description: Select one of the previous applications, such as the to-do list, and implement tests using Jest and React Testing Library to ensure proper rendering, correct labels, and functional behavior.

name: Activity 8
description: Enhance the to-do list application by integrating Supabase for data storage and user authentication, allowing persistent state and secure access to tasks, with full CRUD capabilities.
